00082 void Micropolis::generateMap()
00083 {
00084     generateSomeCity(getRandom16());
00085 }

00087 
00092 void Micropolis::generateSomeCity(int seed)
00093 {
00094     cityFileName = "";
00095 
00096     generateMap(seed);
00097     scenario = SC_NONE;
00098     cityTime = 0;
00099     initSimLoad = 2;
00100     doInitialEval = false;
00101 
00102     initWillStuff();
00103     resetMapState();
00104     resetEditorState();
00105     invalidateMaps();
00106     updateFunds();
00107     doSimInit();
00108 
00109     simUpdate();
00110 
00111     callback("didGenerateMap", "");
00112 }
00113 
00114 
00119 void Micropolis::generateMap(int seed)
00120 {
00121     seedRandom(seed);
00122 
00123     // Construct land.
00124     if (terrainCreateIsland < 0) {
00125         if (getRandom(100) < 10) { /* chance that island is generated */
00126             makeIsland();
00127             return;
00128         }
00129     }
00130 
00131     if (terrainCreateIsland == 1) {
00132         makeNakedIsland();
00133     } else {
00134         clearMap();
00135     }
00136 
00137     // Lay a river.
00138     if (terrainCurveLevel != 0) {
00139         int terrainXStart = 40 + getRandom(WORLD_W - 80);
00140         int terrainYStart = 33 + getRandom(WORLD_H - 67);
00141 
00142         Position terrainPos(terrainXStart, terrainYStart);
00143 
00144         doRivers(terrainPos);
00145     }
00146 
00147     // Lay a few lakes.
00148     if (terrainLakeLevel != 0) {
00149         makeLakes();
00150     }
00151 
00152     smoothRiver();
00153 
00154     // And add trees.
00155     if (terrainTreeLevel != 0) {
00156         doTrees();
00157     }
00158 
00159 }
00160 
00161 
00163 void Micropolis::clearMap()
00164 {
00165     short x, y;
00166 
00167     for (x = 0; x < WORLD_W; x++) {
00168         for (y = 0; y < WORLD_H; y++) {
00169             map[x][y] = DIRT;
00170         }
00171     }
00172 }
00173 
00174 
00176 void Micropolis::clearUnnatural()
00177 {
00178     short x, y;
00179 
00180     for (x = 0; x < WORLD_W; x++) {
00181         for (y = 0; y < WORLD_H; y++) {
00182             if (map[x][y] > WOODS) {
00183                 map[x][y] = DIRT;
00184             }
00185         }
00186     }
00187 }
00188 
00192 void Micropolis::makeNakedIsland()
00193 {
00194     const int terrainIslandRadius = ISLAND_RADIUS;
00195     int x, y;
00196 
00197     for (x = 0; x < WORLD_W; x++) {
00198         for (y = 0; y < WORLD_H; y++) {
00199             if ((x < 5) || (x >= WORLD_W - 5) ||
00200                 (y < 5) || (y >= WORLD_H - 5)) {
00201                 map[x][y] = RIVER;
00202             } else {
00203                 map[x][y] = DIRT;
00204             }
00205         }
00206     }
00207 
00208     for (x = 0; x < WORLD_W - 5; x += 2) {
00209 
00210         int mapY = getERandom(terrainIslandRadius);
00211         plopBRiver(Position(x, mapY));
00212 
00213         mapY = (WORLD_H - 10) - getERandom(terrainIslandRadius);
00214         plopBRiver(Position(x, mapY));
00215 
00216         plopSRiver(Position(x, 0));
00217         plopSRiver(Position(x, WORLD_H - 6));
00218     }
00219 
00220     for (y = 0; y < WORLD_H - 5; y += 2) {
00221 
00222         int mapX = getERandom(terrainIslandRadius);
00223         plopBRiver(Position(mapX, y));
00224 
00225         mapX = (WORLD_W - 10) - getERandom(terrainIslandRadius);
00226         plopBRiver(Position(mapX, y));
00227 
00228         plopSRiver(Position(0, y));
00229         plopSRiver(Position(WORLD_W - 6, y));
00230     }
00231 
00232 }
00233 
00234 
00236 void Micropolis::makeIsland()
00237 {
00238     makeNakedIsland();
00239     smoothRiver();
00240     doTrees();
00241 }
00242 
00243 
00247 void Micropolis::makeLakes()
00248 {
00249     short numLakes;
00250 
00251     if (terrainLakeLevel < 0) {
00252         numLakes = getRandom(10);
00253     } else {
00254         numLakes = terrainLakeLevel / 2;
00255     }
00256 
00257     while (numLakes > 0) {
00258         int x = getRandom(WORLD_W - 21) + 10;
00259         int y = getRandom(WORLD_H - 20) + 10;
00260 
00261         makeSingleLake(Position(x, y));
00262 
00263         numLakes--;
00264     }
00265 }
00266 
00271 void Micropolis::makeSingleLake(const Position &pos)
00272 {
00273     int numPlops = getRandom(12) + 2;
00274 
00275     while (numPlops > 0) {
00276         Position plopPos(pos, getRandom(12) - 6, getRandom(12) - 6);
00277 
00278         if (getRandom(4)) {
00279             plopSRiver(plopPos);
00280         } else {
00281             plopBRiver(plopPos);
00282         }
00283 
00284         numPlops--;
00285     }
00286 }
00287 
00288 
00298 void Micropolis::treeSplash(short xloc, short yloc)
00299 {
00300     short numTrees;
00301 
00302     if (terrainTreeLevel < 0) {
00303         numTrees = getRandom(150) + 50;
00304     } else {
00305         numTrees = getRandom(100 + (terrainTreeLevel * 2)) + 50;
00306     }
00307 
00308     Position treePos(xloc, yloc);
00309 
00310     while (numTrees > 0) {
00311         Direction2 dir = (Direction2)(DIR2_NORTH + getRandom(7));
00312         treePos.move(dir);
00313 
00314         if (!treePos.testBounds()) {
00315             return;
00316         }
00317 
00318         if ((map[treePos.posX][treePos.posY] & LOMASK) == DIRT) {
00319             map[treePos.posX][treePos.posY] = WOODS | BLBNBIT;
00320         }
00321 
00322         numTrees--;
00323     }
00324 }
00325 
00326 
00328 void Micropolis::doTrees()
00329 {
00330     short Amount, x, xloc, yloc;
00331 
00332     if (terrainTreeLevel < 0) {
00333         Amount = getRandom(100) + 50;
00334     } else {
00335         Amount = terrainTreeLevel + 3;
00336     }
00337 
00338     for (x = 0; x < Amount; x++) {
00339         xloc = getRandom(WORLD_W - 1);
00340         yloc = getRandom(WORLD_H - 1);
00341         treeSplash(xloc, yloc);
00342     }
00343 
00344     smoothTrees();
00345     smoothTrees();
00346 }
00347 
00348 
00349 void Micropolis::smoothRiver()
00350 {
00351     static short dx[4] = { -1,  0,  1,  0 };
00352     static short dy[4] = {  0,  1,  0, -1 };
00353     static short REdTab[16] = {
00354         13 | BULLBIT,   13 | BULLBIT,     17 | BULLBIT,     15 | BULLBIT,
00355         5 | BULLBIT,    2,                19 | BULLBIT,     17 | BULLBIT,
00356         9 | BULLBIT,    11 | BULLBIT,     2,                13 | BULLBIT,
00357         7 | BULLBIT,    9 | BULLBIT,      5 | BULLBIT,      2 };
00358 
00359     short bitIndex, z, xTemp, yTemp;
00360     short temp, x, y;
00361 
00362     for (x = 0; x < WORLD_W; x++) {
00363         for (y = 0; y < WORLD_H; y++) {
00364 
00365             if (map[x][y] == REDGE) {
00366                 bitIndex = 0;
00367 
00368                 for (z = 0; z < 4; z++) {
00369                     bitIndex = bitIndex << 1;
00370                     xTemp = x + dx[z];
00371                     yTemp = y + dy[z];
00372                     if (testBounds(xTemp, yTemp) &&
00373                         ((map[xTemp][yTemp] & LOMASK) != DIRT) &&
00374                         (((map[xTemp][yTemp] & LOMASK) < WOODS_LOW) ||
00375                          ((map[xTemp][yTemp] & LOMASK) > WOODS_HIGH))) {
00376                         bitIndex++;
00377                     }
00378                 }
00379 
00380                 temp = REdTab[bitIndex & 15];
00381 
00382                 if ((temp != RIVER) &&
00383                     getRandom(1)) {
00384                     temp++;
00385                 }
00386 
00387                 map[x][y] = temp;
00388             }
00389         }
00390     }
00391 }
00392 
00393 
00394 bool Micropolis::isTree(MapValue cell)
00395 {
00396     if ((cell & LOMASK) >= WOODS_LOW && (cell & LOMASK) <= WOODS_HIGH) {
00397         return true;
00398     }
00399 
00400     return false;
00401 }
00402 
00403 
00404 void Micropolis::smoothTrees()
00405 {
00406     short x, y;
00407     for (x = 0; x < WORLD_W; x++) {
00408         for (y = 0; y < WORLD_H; y++) {
00409             if (isTree(map[x][y])) {
00410                 smoothTreesAt(x, y, false);
00411             }
00412         }
00413     }
00414 }
00415 
00417 void Micropolis::smoothTreesAt(int x, int y, bool preserve)
00418 {
00419     ToolEffects effects(this);
00420 
00421     smoothTreesAt(x, y, preserve, &effects);
00422     effects.modifyWorld();
00423 }
00424 
00425 
00429 void Micropolis::smoothTreesAt(int x, int y, bool preserve,
00430                                ToolEffects *effects)
00431 {
00432     static short dx[4] = { -1,  0,  1,  0 };
00433     static short dy[4] = {  0,  1,  0, -1 };
00434     static const short treeTable[16] = {
00435         0,  0,  0,  34,
00436         0,  0,  36, 35,
00437         0,  32, 0,  33,
00438         30, 31, 29, 37,
00439     };
00440 
00441     if (!isTree(effects->getMapValue(x, y))) {
00442         return;
00443     }
00444 
00445     int bitIndex = 0;
00446     int z;
00447     for (z = 0; z < 4; z++) {
00448         bitIndex = bitIndex << 1;
00449         int xTemp = x + dx[z];
00450         int yTemp = y + dy[z];
00451         if (testBounds(xTemp, yTemp)
00452                             && isTree(effects->getMapValue(xTemp, yTemp))) {
00453             bitIndex++;
00454         }
00455     }
00456 
00457     int temp = treeTable[bitIndex & 15];
00458     if (temp) {
00459         if (temp != WOODS) {
00460             if ((x + y) & 1) {
00461                 temp = temp - 8;
00462             }
00463         }
00464         effects->setMapValue(x, y, temp | BLBNBIT);
00465     } else {
00466         if (!preserve) {
00467             effects->setMapValue(x, y, temp);
00468         }
00469     }
00470 }
00471 
00472 
00477 void Micropolis::doRivers(const Position &terrainPos)
00478 {
00479     Direction2 riverDir;   // Global direction of the river
00480     Direction2 terrainDir; // Local direction of the river
00481 
00482     riverDir = (Direction2)(DIR2_NORTH + (getRandom(3) * 2));
00483     doBRiver(terrainPos, riverDir, riverDir);
00484 
00485     riverDir = rotate180(riverDir);
00486     terrainDir = doBRiver(terrainPos, riverDir, riverDir);
00487 
00488     riverDir = (Direction2)(DIR2_NORTH + (getRandom(3) * 2));
00489     doSRiver(terrainPos, riverDir, terrainDir);
00490 }
00491 
00492 
00500 Direction2 Micropolis::doBRiver(const Position &riverPos,
00501                                 Direction2 riverDir, Direction2 terrainDir)
00502 {
00503     int rate1, rate2;
00504 
00505     if (terrainCurveLevel < 0) {
00506         rate1 = 100;
00507         rate2 = 200;
00508     } else {
00509         rate1 = terrainCurveLevel + 10;
00510         rate2 = terrainCurveLevel + 100;
00511     }
00512 
00513     Position pos(riverPos);
00514 
00515     while (testBounds(pos.posX + 4, pos.posY + 4)) {
00516         plopBRiver(pos);
00517         if (getRandom(rate1) < 10) {
00518             terrainDir = riverDir;
00519         } else {
00520             if (getRandom(rate2) > 90) {
00521                 terrainDir = rotate45(terrainDir);
00522             }
00523             if (getRandom(rate2) > 90) {
00524                 terrainDir = rotate45(terrainDir, 7);
00525             }
00526         }
00527         pos.move(terrainDir);
00528     }
00529 
00530     return terrainDir;
00531 }
00532 
00540 Direction2 Micropolis::doSRiver(const Position &riverPos,
00541                                 Direction2 riverDir, Direction2 terrainDir)
00542 {
00543     int rate1, rate2;
00544 
00545     if (terrainCurveLevel < 0) {
00546         rate1 = 100;
00547         rate2 = 200;
00548     } else {
00549         rate1 = terrainCurveLevel + 10;
00550         rate2 = terrainCurveLevel + 100;
00551     }
00552 
00553     Position pos(riverPos);
00554 
00555     while (testBounds(pos.posX + 3, pos.posY + 3)) {
00556         //printf("doSRiver %d %d td %d rd %d\n", pos.posX, pos.posY, terrainDir, riverDir);
00557         plopSRiver(pos);
00558         if (getRandom(rate1) < 10) {
00559             terrainDir = riverDir;
00560         } else {
00561             if (getRandom(rate2) > 90) {
00562                 terrainDir = rotate45(terrainDir);
00563             }
00564             if (getRandom(rate2) > 90) {
00565                 terrainDir = rotate45(terrainDir, 7);
00566             }
00567         }
00568         pos.move(terrainDir);
00569     }
00570 
00571     return terrainDir;
00572 }
00573 
00574 
00581 void Micropolis::putOnMap(MapValue mChar, short xLoc, short yLoc)
00582 {
00583     if (mChar == 0) {
00584         return;
00585     }
00586 
00587     if (!testBounds(xLoc, yLoc)) {
00588         return;
00589     }
00590 
00591     MapValue temp = map[xLoc][yLoc];
00592 
00593     if (temp != DIRT) {
00594         temp = temp & LOMASK;
00595         if (temp == RIVER) {
00596             if (mChar != CHANNEL) {
00597                 return;
00598             }
00599         }
00600         if (temp == CHANNEL) {
00601             return;
00602         }
00603     }
00604     map[xLoc][yLoc] = mChar;
00605 }
00606 
00611 void Micropolis::plopBRiver(const Position &pos)
00612 {
00613     short x, y;
00614     static MapValue BRMatrix[9][9] = {
00615         {     0,       0,       0,   REDGE,   REDGE,   REDGE,       0,       0,       0 },
00616         {     0,       0,   REDGE,   RIVER,   RIVER,   RIVER,   REDGE,       0,       0 },
00617         {     0,   REDGE,   RIVER,   RIVER,   RIVER,   RIVER,   RIVER,   REDGE,       0 },
00618         { REDGE,   RIVER,   RIVER,   RIVER,   RIVER,   RIVER,   RIVER,   RIVER,   REDGE },
00619         { REDGE,   RIVER,   RIVER,   RIVER, CHANNEL,   RIVER,   RIVER,   RIVER,   REDGE },
00620         { REDGE,   RIVER,   RIVER,   RIVER,   RIVER,   RIVER,   RIVER,   RIVER,   REDGE },
00621         {     0,   REDGE,   RIVER,   RIVER,   RIVER,   RIVER,   RIVER,   REDGE,       0 },
00622         {     0,       0,   REDGE,   RIVER,   RIVER,   RIVER,   REDGE,       0,       0 },
00623         {     0,       0,       0,   REDGE,   REDGE,   REDGE,       0,       0,       0 },
00624     };
00625 
00626     for (x = 0; x < 9; x++) {
00627         for (y = 0; y < 9; y++) {
00628             putOnMap(BRMatrix[y][x], pos.posX + x, pos.posY + y);
00629         }
00630     }
00631 }
00632 
00633 
00638 void Micropolis::plopSRiver(const Position &pos)
00639 {
00640     short x, y;
00641     static MapValue SRMatrix[6][6] = {
00642         {     0,     0, REDGE, REDGE,     0,     0 },
00643         {     0, REDGE, RIVER, RIVER, REDGE,     0 },
00644         { REDGE, RIVER, RIVER, RIVER, RIVER, REDGE },
00645         { REDGE, RIVER, RIVER, RIVER, RIVER, REDGE },
00646         {     0, REDGE, RIVER, RIVER, REDGE,     0 },
00647         {     0,     0, REDGE, REDGE,     0,     0 },
00648     };
00649 
00650     for (x = 0; x < 6; x++) {
00651         for (y = 0; y < 6; y++) {
00652             putOnMap(SRMatrix[y][x], pos.posX + x, pos.posY + y);
00653         }
00654     }
00655 }
00656 
00657 
00658 void Micropolis::smoothWater()
00659 {
00660     int x, y;
00661     MapTile tile;
00662     Direction2 dir;
00663 
00664     for (x = 0; x < WORLD_W; x++) {
00665         for (y = 0; y < WORLD_H; y++) {
00666 
00667             tile = map[x][y] & LOMASK;
00668 
00669             /* If (x, y) is water: */
00670             if (tile >= WATER_LOW && tile <= WATER_HIGH) {
00671 
00672                 const Position pos(x, y);
00673                 for (dir = DIR2_BEGIN; dir < DIR2_END; dir = increment90(dir)) {
00674 
00675                     /* If getting a tile off-map, condition below fails. */
00676                     // @note I think this may have been a bug, since it always uses DIR2_WEST instead of dir.
00677                     //tile = getTileFromMap(pos, DIR2_WEST, WATER_LOW);
00678                     tile = getTileFromMap(pos, dir, WATER_LOW);
00679 
00680                     /* If nearest object is not water: */
00681                     if (tile < WATER_LOW || tile > WATER_HIGH) {
00682                         map[x][y] = REDGE; /* set river edge */
00683                         break; // Continue with next tile
00684                     }
00685                 }
00686             }
00687         }
00688     }
00689 
00690     for (x = 0; x < WORLD_W; x++) {
00691         for (y = 0; y < WORLD_H; y++) {
00692 
00693             tile = map[x][y] & LOMASK;
00694 
00695             /* If water which is not a channel: */
00696             if (tile != CHANNEL && tile >= WATER_LOW && tile <= WATER_HIGH) {
00697 
00698                 bool makeRiver = true; // make (x, y) a river
00699 
00700                 const Position pos(x, y);
00701                 for (dir = DIR2_BEGIN; dir < DIR2_END; dir = increment90(dir)) {
00702 
00703                     /* If getting a tile off-map, condition below fails. */
00704                     // @note I think this may have been a bug, since it always uses DIR2_WEST instead of dir.
00705                     //tile = getTileFromMap(pos, DIR2_WEST, WATER_LOW);
00706                     tile = getTileFromMap(pos, dir, WATER_LOW);
00707 
00708                     /* If nearest object is not water: */
00709                     if (tile < WATER_LOW || tile > WATER_HIGH) {
00710                         makeRiver = false;
00711                         break;
00712                     }
00713                 }
00714 
00715                 if (makeRiver) {
00716                     map[x][y] = RIVER; /* make it a river */
00717                 }
00718             }
00719         }
00720     }
00721 
00722     for (x = 0; x < WORLD_W; x++) {
00723         for (y = 0; y < WORLD_H; y++) {
00724 
00725             tile = map[x][y] & LOMASK;
00726 
00727             /* If woods: */
00728             if (tile >= WOODS_LOW && tile <= WOODS_HIGH) {
00729 
00730                 const Position pos(x, y);
00731                 for (dir = DIR2_BEGIN; dir < DIR2_END; dir = increment90(dir)) {
00732 
00733                     /* If getting a tile off-map, condition below fails. */
00734                     // @note I think this may have been a bug, since it always uses DIR2_WEST instead of dir.
00735                     //tile = getTileFromMap(pos, DIR2_WEST, WATER_LOW);
00736                     tile = getTileFromMap(pos, dir, TILE_INVALID);
00737 
00738                     if (tile == RIVER || tile == CHANNEL) {
00739                         map[x][y] = REDGE; /* make it water's edge */
00740                         break;
00741                     }
00742                 }
00743             }
00744         }
00745     }
00746 }
